original_title: L'Âge d'or des chansons de notre enfance
overview: This 135-minute documentary offers to reopen this magical parenthesis which has seen the birth of a whirlwind of artists with very different styles. From Chantal Goya to Annie Cordy, from Pierre Perret to Carlos. They knew how to bring each in their own way generations of children into their poetic universe.
tagline: Rediscover the hits of your childhood!
title: The Golden Age of Songs From Our Childhood
